name: Château de La Ballue - Teritoria
description:
Set in a castle dating back to the 17th-Century, Château de La Ballue - Teritoria is classed as an Historic Monument and is surrounded by large gardens. The property is located between Saint-Malo and Mont Saint-Michel.

All rooms and suites are decorated in an elegant yet modern style with wooden period furniture. The private bathrooms include a bathrobe, slippers and free organic toiletries. Free WiFi access is also available in the room.

A buffet breakfast with local fresh products is available each morning and is served in the château's dining room.

Featuring old trees, topiaries and fountains, the remarkable gardens combine perspective, shade and light. Guests can use the outdoor spa and sauna, which has views of the Douves Garden and you can also relax on the deckchairs by the pond.

On-site private parking is provided and possible nearby activities include golfing.

name: Gîtes de l'Orée du Bois
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Gîtes de l'Orée du Bois is situated in Boussières, 17 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station and 17 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station. The air-conditioned accommodation is 14 km from Micropolis. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi, free private parking and an electric vehicle charging station.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units have bed linen.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is available for the continental breakfast. For those times when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to cook on the barbecue.

Guests at the aparthotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Boussières, like walking tours. If you would like to discover the area, cycling, fishing and hiking are possible in the surroundings and Gîtes de l'Orée du Bois can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 26 km from the accommodation, while Besançon Vesoul University is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 61 km from Gîtes de l'Orée du Bois.

name: Hotel Les Restanques De Moustiers
description:
This Provencal-style hotel has a floral terrace and is only 500 metres from the village of Moustiers Sainte Marie. Surrounded by nature, Hotel Les Restanques De Moustiers offers panoramic views.

Guest rooms are decorated in warm colours with floor-to-ceiling windows allowing plenty of natural light. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV and feature a private bathroom.

Hotel Les Restanques De Moustiers serves a daily buffet breakfast which can be enjoyed on the terrace.  In the evenings guests can relax with a drink at the bar.

The hotel is only 5 km from the Sainte-Croix Lake, where there are opportunities for canoeing, sailing and swimming. The Gorges du Verdon are 5 km away and free private parking is available on site.

name: Ducey Appart'Hôtel - Les Rivières
description:
Set 25 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, 25 km from Mont Saint-Michel and 37 km from Granville Train Station, Ducey Appart'Hôtel - Les Rivières offers accommodation situated in Ducey. The property features city and quiet street views, and is 13 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel. The aparthotel has family rooms.

All units come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. With a private bathroom, units at the aparthotel also feature free WiFi. At the aparthotel, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

An à la carte breakfast is available every morning at the property and includes fresh pastries and juice.

Champrepus Zoo is 39 km from the aparthotel, while Granville's Marina is 39 km from the property.

name: Gite Villa Avril piscine- jacuzzi- sauna - 15 Pers-proche Europapark
description:
Gite Villa Avril piscine- jacuzzi- sauna - 15 Pers-proche Europapark is a recently renovated villa in Sélestat, where guests can makes the most of its outdoor swimming pool, spa and wellness centre and garden. This property offers access to a terrace, table tennis, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 14 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

Boasting a game console, the spacious villa has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, 2 living rooms with a seating area and a dining area, 5 bedrooms, and 4 bathrooms with a hot tub and a bath. Guests can enjoy an ambient stay in their soundproof room with parquet floors and a fireplace. The villa offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

Barbecue facilities are at guests' disposal and guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Colmar Expo is 21 km from the villa, while House of the Heads is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 39 km from Gite Villa Avril piscine- jacuzzi- sauna - 15 Pers-proche Europapark.

name: La Ramade - Teritoria
description:
Composed of 2 villas and situated 400 metres from Avranches Train Station in Mont Saint Michel's bay, La Ramade - Teritoria is a mansion surrounded by well-established gardens. It offers en suite rooms with free Wi-Fi.

All rooms at La Ramade - Teritoria are soundproofed. One of the villas has rooms with romantic feel and are decorated in a flower theme while the other offers contemporary-style rooms. Most rooms have views of the gardens or surrounding countryside and some are serviced by a lift.

Breakfast is served in a glass-roofed breakfast room that looks out onto a flowery garden. Le P’tit Bonheur provides beverages in a tea room and wine bar area.

The Mont Saint Michel is 20 km from La Ramade - Teritoria. The seaside town of Granville is 22 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Le Moulin du Château
description:
Le Moulin Du Château is a former olive oil mill, located in Saint-Laurent-du-Verdon, Provence. It offers rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The hotel also has a lounge, terrace and a garden surrounded by the Verdon Nature Park. The original mill room is now used as a games room with pool table and library.

The hotel's restaurant serves organic seasonal cuisine.

Guests have free access to the nearby tennis court and there are canoeing and hiking facilities nearby.

Le Moulin Du Château is close to the Grand Canyon and the Lake of Ste-Croix. Aix-en-Provence is an hour’s drive away.

name: Hôtel Spa Les Alpes
description:
Ideally located near the famous Gorges du Verdon and Lavender Route, the hotel offers 3-star accommodation close to the Templars Castle in Gréoux-les-Bains, just 14 km from Valensole.

Hôtel Spa Les Alpes features air-conditioned rooms in exceptional surroundings, an outdoor swimming pool and free on-site parking. The restaurant serves both traditional and contemporary cuisine and features a shady terrace.

Gréoux-les-Bains is a charming Provencal village known for its pure thermal waters and its large choice of activities (spa, traditional markets, museums, churches, excursions, water sports and casino).

name: Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy
description:
Featuring 4-star accommodation, Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy is set in Annecy, 2.1 km from Palais de l Ile and 2.2 km from Chateau d'Annecy. The property is close to several noted attractions, around 1.7 km from Bridge of Love and around 1.8 km from Bonlieu Performing Arts Centre. The property is close to popular attractions like Annecy School of Art, Annecy Town Hall and Annecy Court House.

All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with air conditioning, and selected rooms also offer a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. The hotel features a restaurant open for lunch and diner with a terrace facing the Lake of Annecy.

The property boasts an indoor swimming pool, with sauna, hammam, hot tub and fitness room with free access. Spa massages and yoga session are available at an extra cost.

Guests can find 2 private parking on site (indoor and outdoor) available at an extra cost.

Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French.

Annecy Court House is 2 km from Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy, while Church of St. Francis is 2.1 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 37 km away.

name: Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg
description:
Offering city views, Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg is an accommodation situated in Sélestat, 24 km from House of the Heads and 24 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. It is set 14 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and offers free WiFi plus a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 21 km from Colmar Expo.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Colmar Train Station is 25 km from the apartment, while Würth Museum is 27 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 39 km from Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg.

name: Allobroges Park Hôtel
description:
Set in Annecy City Centre, this 3-star hotel is located a 10-minute walk from Annecy Chateau. It has a 24-hour reception and offers free WiFi access.

All guest room are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They offer work desk and an LCD TV. Some rooms feature exposed beams. The private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The onsite bar is open 24/7 and there is a terrace open during summer.

Lake Annecy is a 10-minute walk from Allobroges Hotel. Private Parking is available upon prior reservation only and subject to availability. Annecy Train Station is 260 metres away.

name: Le Relais Notre Dame
description:
Located at the entrance to Quinson village, next to the prehistoric museum, Le Relais Notre Dame is 300 metres from the Verdon River and a 20-minute drive from Sainte-Croix Lake. The property features an outdoor swimming pool and a restaurant with a terrace.

Combining a modern and Mediterranean décor, all rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi. The private bathrooms have either a bathtub or shower and offer complimentary toiletries upon arrival.

Breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast room or in guests’ rooms. The hotel’s restaurant offers a seasonal menu with fresh, local produce, accompanied by a range of wines from the bar.

During their stay guests are invited to relax on the sunloungers by the swimming pool, or enjoy the colourful gardens. Additional facilities at this hotel include free private parking available on site.

name: Le Pélican
description:
Situated in Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo, Le Pélican features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms have a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and gluten-free options.

Bourget Lake is 38 km from Le Pélican, while Stade de Genève is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 43 km from the accommodation.

name: Hébé Hotel
description:
New hotel - Opening May 2021.

Hébé Hotel is located in the centre of Annecy, a 10-minute walk from the lake.

The hotel rooms each include a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available each day. Annecy offers an array of bars and restaurants. The closest can be found just 300 metres from the hotel.

The property is located just 250 metres from the train station and bus station. Local sites of interest may include the town hall, St Maurice Church, and Saint-Pierre Cathedral.

name: Cote Ouest
description:
Facing Lake Annecy, Cote Ouest is a 15-minute drive from Annecy Train Station. It offers self-catering accommodation, free Wi-Fi throughout, and a continental breakfast is available at a supplement.

The apartments feature a flat-screen TV with a DVD player and a terrace with views of the surrounding mountains and lake. Each bedroom has a wardrobe and the private bathrooms include a shower and hairdryer.

The fully-equipped kitchens have a dishwasher, refrigerator, oven, a coffee machine and kitchenware. Bakeries, shops and restaurants can be found within walking distance. Ironing and laundry facilities are also provided, and a concierge service, bike rental and in-room breakfast service are available.

Nearby outdoor activities include water activities on Lake Annecy during summer, as well as hiking and paragliding. There is a private beach located next to the property offering special offers and activities for guests. In the winter Cote Ouest offers a shuttle service to numerous ski resorts, which are within 35 km of the property.

name: Logis Hôtel Le Vieil Amandier
description:
Le Vieil Amandier is located in the small village of Trigance, in the heart of the Verdon Nature Reserve. Its facilities include an outdoor swimming pool and free on-site parking.

The guest rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Some rooms have direct access to the hotel garden.

Guests can have breakfast on the terrace overlooking the pool and Jabron Plain or in the main dining room. Restaurants can be found in the village.

Logis Hotel Le Vieil Amandier has a Spa & Wellness Centre including a sauna and a hot tub at an extra cost.

name: Hôtel Le Pré Carré
description:
Le Pré Carré is a hotel located in the heart of Annecy, just 250 metres from Lake Annecy.

Guest rooms at Le Pré Carré are soundproofed and equipped with flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

The hotel offers a buffet breakfast, which can be served in your room. Le Pré Carré also provides a business centre, a 24-hour reception and on-site parking.

name: Hôtel Victor Hugo
description:
Located in Pontorson, 10 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, Hôtel Victor Hugo provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. The property is around 23 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel, 39 km from Port of Houle and 43 km from The Pointe du Grouin. The property is non-smoking and is set 10 km from Mont Saint-Michel.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms will provide you with a city view.

Solidor Tower is 45 km from Hôtel Victor Hugo, while Granville Train Station is 48 km away. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 83 km from the accommodation.

name: Impérial Palace
description:
Located in the heart of the French Alps, Impérial Palace is a 4-star hotel is on the edge of Lake Annecy, 1.6 km from Annecy's centre. It offers air-conditioned accommodation, a spa and a casino. Free WiFi is provided.

Each guest room at L'Imperial Palace has a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Most rooms also have a balcony with a view of the lake and surrounding mountains or park. A courtesy tray with tea is available in each room.

The hotel’s gastronomic restaurant, La Voile, provides traditional French cuisine. Meals are served on a shaded terrace overlooking the lake. L'Impérial Palace also has a a more casual restaurant called La Brasserie, a bar, and a lounge where guests can enjoy homemade pastries, snacks and a full buffet breakfast.

The onsite 600 m² spa includes a swimming pool, an experience shower, a sauna, a hammam, an ice fountain, a spa bath and private treatment rooms. Impérial Palace offers also offers a business centre.

Free parking is available on site. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property. Geneva International Airport is 40 km away and Annecy Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. Annecy Château is 2 km away.

name: La Bastide du Calalou; BW Signature Collection
description:
Bastide Du Calalou is located a 30-minute drive from the Gorges du Verdon and a 20-minute drive from the Sainte-Croix Lake. It features a heated, outdoor swimming pool, a tennis court and elegant guestrooms that overlook the Aups Valley.

Rooms at Bastide Du Calalou are equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have a DVD and video player.

A full breakfast buffet is served daily and Bastide’s restaurant serves regional cuisine, prepared with local produce. Guests can enjoy lunch and dinner in the restaurant or on the terrace.

Bastide Du Calalou is close to the village of Tourtour and the black truffle market, which is the third largest in France and open from December to April.
